title: Which astrological placement causes hearing problems? Is there any cure? Are there any suggestions of gemstones or remedies?
description: Answer (1 of 5): All. They make one deaf to *reason and common sense*. This can easily be observed. No matter how often the nonsensicality of astrology is demonstrated - it will change nothing in the people who believe in it. Btw there's a serious drawback: the belief that one's life is determin...
